verses.verse: כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD שַׁ֜עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar The gate הֶחָצֵ֤ר <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer court הַפְּנִימִית֙ <WH6442> hap-pe-ni-Mit of the inner הַפֹּנֶ֣ה <WH6437> hap-po-Neh that looketh קָדִ֔ים <WH6921> ka-Dim, toward the east יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become סָג֔וּר <WH5462> sa-Gur, shall be shut שֵׁ֖שֶׁת <WH8337> She-shet the six יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei days הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH4639> ham-ma-'a-Seh; working וּבְי֤וֹם <WH3117> u-ve-Yom and in the day הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat the sabbath יִפָּתֵ֔חַ <WH6605> yip-pa-Te-ach, it shall be opened וּבְי֥וֹם <WH3117> u-ve-Yom the day הַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> ha-Cho-desh of the new moon יִפָּתֵֽחַ׃ <WH6605> yip-pa-Te-ach. it shall be opened
